title: T205 Christy Mathewson PSA 3 Honest Long Cut
author: bounce

posts.post_title: T205 Christy Mathewson PSA 3 Honest Long Cut
posts.post_content:
Nice looking Matty T205, with a less than common back.
$2400 DLVD net to me

I might also consider trade, but only for other HOFers (primarily collect T206, but would also consider T205 and some of the E- sets).

DM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url].

I'll take it trumps any ongoing negotiations.
